configurations.name: LaceworkConfig
configurations.value:
{
    "name": "LaceworkConfiguration",
    "policyID": "LW_S3_9",
    "violationdescription": "Ensure the S3 bucket ACL does not grant AWS users WRITE_ACP permission [modify bucket ACL]",
    "eventuuid": "e6bc35df-fbd1-414a-a2d9-9a1cf0d40668",
    "dotheremediationviacli": "false",
    "dotheremediationviaobject": "false",
    "sendslackmessagesforignored": "true",
    "bucketIgnoreList":[
        "arn:aws:s3:::mybucket01",
        "arn:aws:s3:::mybucket02",
        "arn:aws:s3:::mybucket03"
    ]
}
